titleStmt.title: The exhaltation of Christ in the dayes of the Gospel as the alone high-priest, prophet, and king, of saints. / By Thomas Collier, sometimes teacher to the church in Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Collier, Thomas, fl. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by R.L. for Giles Calvert, at the black Spred-Eagle, at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
